overview:
Alexander Park specializes in the field of international standards of metadata. He served the ISO (International Standards Organization) / TEC1 (Technical Engineering Committee Section One) / Subcommittee-36 from 2003 to 2006 as a professional member of delegation of Korea Standards National Body.

He is also one of the most recognized individual expert in Korea e-Learning industry. He was awarded the National Merit of e-Learning by the Korean Government. He is engaged in software development over 20 years and has completed dozens of projects successfully. His expertise extends to, but not limited to the area of metadata and shareable content objects in international standards.
